content: Wood circular plunge saw blade Top-performance circular plunge saw blade for wood, with carbide teeth to cut faster, last longer and maximize your productivity with cordless plunge saws ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ultimate wood-cutting circular saw blades – engineered to cut faster and last longer in all types of wood Higher speed, lower vibration – 24 high-density carbide teeth help to saw rapidly and smoothly through all wooden construction materials Increase productivity – our blades are optimized for our cordless plunge saws, allowing you to cut wood up to 30% faster More cuts per charge – the blade’s ultra-thin kerf helps minimize energy consumption, so you can cut up to 40% more per battery charge Longer-lasting blades – low-friction coatings help protect blades from excess heat, helping you get more done with every blade Applications Plunge -cutting all wooden construction materials: timber (structural & non-structural), lumber, solid wood (hard & soft) Plunge -cutting wood-based boards, such as OSB, plywood, particle board and formwork ### TECHNICAL DATA: Blade features: Special for cordless, Long life, Ultra thin kerf technology, Carbide tipped Blade diameter: 6.5 in Number of teeth: 24 Technical Data | Blade features | Special for cordless, Long life, Ultra thin kerf technology, Carbide tipped | Blade diameter | 6.5 in | Number of teeth | 24 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2361744 - Circ. saw blade SCBW FRR SPX 6 1/2 (5) - Package Size 5 pc
